26 QCommandLineOption argList (QStringList() << "l" << "list", QObject::tr("List available devices"));
27 QCommandLineOption argWrite (QStringList() << "w" << "write", QObject::tr("Write program to EEPROM"));
28 QCommandLineOption argDevice (QStringList() << "d" << "device", QObject::tr("Device to program (default: first system device)"), "DEV");
29 QCommandLineOption argPin (QStringList() << "p" << "pin", QObject::tr("Pin for GPIO reset"), "PIN");
30 QCommandLineOption argTerm (QStringList() << "t" << "terminal",QObject::tr("Drop into terminal after download"));
31 QCommandLineOption argIdentify (QStringList() << "i" << "identify",QObject::tr("Identify device connected at port"));
32 QCommandLineOption argInfo (QStringList() << "image", QObject::tr("Print info about downloadable image"));
33 
34 #if defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6) && defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
35  int reset_pin = 17;
36 #else
37  int reset_pin = -1;
38 #endif
39 
40 QStringList device_list = PropellerSession::list_devices();
41 
42 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
43 {
44  QCoreApplication app(argc, argv);
45 
46  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("Parallax Inc.");
47  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("www.parallax.com");
48  QCoreApplication::setApplicationVersion(VERSION);
49  QCoreApplication::setApplicationName(QObject::tr("Propeller Manager CLI"));
50 
51  QCommandLineParser parser;
52  parser.addHelpOption();
53  parser.addVersionOption();
54  parser.setApplicationDescription(
55  QObject::tr("\nA command-line wrapper for the Propeller Manager API"
56  "\nCopyright 2015 by %1").arg(QCoreApplication::organizationName()));
57 
58  parser.addOption(argList);
59  parser.addOption(argWrite);
60  parser.addOption(argDevice);
61  parser.addOption(argPin);
62  parser.addOption(argTerm);
63  parser.addOption(argIdentify);
64  parser.addOption(argInfo);
65 
66  parser.addPositionalArgument("file", QObject::tr("Binary file to download"), "FILE");
67 
68  parser.process(app);
69 
70  if (parser.isSet(argList))
71  {
72  list();
73  return 0;
74  }
75 
76  if (!parser.value(argPin).isEmpty())
77  reset_pin = parser.value(argPin).toInt();
78 
79  if (reset_pin > -1)
80  qDebug() << "Using GPIO pin" << reset_pin << "for hardware reset";
81 
82 
83  if (parser.isSet(argIdentify))
84  {
85  foreach (QString d, device_list)
86  {
87  PropellerSession session(d,reset_pin);
88 
89  if (!session.open())
90  continue;
91 
92  switch (session.version())
93  {
94  case 1:
95  printf("[ %-16s ] %s\n", qPrintable(d), "Propeller P8X32A");
96  break;
97  case 0:
98  default:
99  printf("[ %-16s ] %-9s\n",qPrintable(d), "NOT FOUND");
100  break;
101  }
102 
103  fflush(stdout);
104  session.close();
105  }
106  }
107  else if (parser.isSet(argInfo))
108  {
109  info(load_image(parser));
110  }
111  else
112  {
113  open_session(parser, device_list);
114  }
115 
116  return 0;
117 }
118 
119 void open_session(QCommandLineParser &parser, QStringList device_list)
120 {
121  if (device_list.isEmpty())
122  error("No device available for download!");
123 
124  QString device = device_list[0];
125  if (!parser.value(argDevice).isEmpty())
126  {
127  device = parser.value(argDevice);
128  if (!device_list.contains(device))
129  error("Device '"+device+"' not available");
130  }
131 
132  PropellerSession session(device,reset_pin);
133  if (!session.open())
134  error("Failed to open "+device+"!");
135 
136  if (parser.positionalArguments().isEmpty())
137  {
138  if (parser.isSet(argTerm))
139  terminal(session, device);
140  else
141  error("Must provide name of binary");
142  }
143  else
144  {
145  PropellerImage image = load_image(parser);
146  if (!image.isValid())
147  error("Image is invalid!");
148 
149  session.upload(image, parser.isSet(argWrite));
150 
151  if (parser.isSet(argTerm))
152  terminal(session, device);
153  }
154 
155  session.close();
156 }
157 
158 void list()
159 {
160  for (int i = 0; i < device_list.size(); i++)
161  {
162  printf("%s\n",qPrintable(device_list[i]));
163  }
164 }
165 
166 void terminal(PropellerSession & session, QString device)
167 {
168  qDebug() << "--------------------------------------";
169  qDebug() << "Opening terminal:" << qPrintable(device);
170  qDebug() << " (Ctrl+C to exit)";
171  qDebug() << "--------------------------------------";
172 
173  session.terminal();
174 }
175 
176 void info(PropellerImage image)
177 {
178  printf(" Image: %s\n",qPrintable(image.fileName()));
179  printf(" Type: %s\n",qPrintable(image.imageTypeText()));
180  printf(" Size: %u\n",image.imageSize());
181  printf(" Checksum: %u\n",image.checksum());
182  printf(" Program size: %u\n",image.programSize());
183  printf(" Variable size: %u\n",image.variableSize());
184  printf(" Free/stack size: %u\n",image.stackSize());
185  printf(" Clock mode: %s\n",qPrintable(image.clockModeText()));
186 
187  if (image.clockMode() != 0x00 && image.clockMode() != 0x01)
188  printf(" Clock frequency: %i\n",image.clockFrequency());
189 }
190 
191 PropellerImage load_image(QCommandLineParser &parser)
192 {
193  QString filename = parser.positionalArguments()[0];
194  QRegularExpression re_binary(".*\\.binary$");
195  QRegularExpression re_eeprom(".*\\.eeprom$");
196 
197  if (!QFileInfo(filename).exists())
198  error("File does not exist!");
199 
200  if (!filename.contains(re_binary) && !filename.contains(re_eeprom))
201  error("Invalid file specified!");
202 
203  return PropellerImage(Utility::readFile(filename),filename);
204 }
205 
206 void error(const QString & message)
207 {
208  qDebug() << "Error:" << qPrintable(message);
209  exit(1);
210 }
